p: Chemical composition of wilting alfalfa and after ensiled alfalfa is given in Table 3. Cumin essential oil addition prevented protein fractionation (proteolysis), especially in CNM3 group wherer CP amount was found to be 24.52% (p<0.05). In this period, also the determination of NH 3-N being 14.50 g/kg TN (p<0.05) at the lowest level supports this condition. Adding CNM3 into the silages decreased crude fiber (CF), NDF, ADF, and ADL levels compared to CON (p<0.05), but CNM5 increased CF and ADF levels compared to CON (p< 0.05).
